column4: does anyone know how to get a sd media card reader on toshiba laptop to work with edgy?
look at 'dmesg | less' and see if you see it identified as an 'sd' device somewhere
dmesg | less doesn't show anything about sd device
I have things like -> "Vendor: Generic   Model: USB SD Reader" in my logs
I'm not sure, unless you need to load kernel mods for usb devices etc.
give your password when it prompts you
then  'tail /var/log/messages'  see if it babbles about a storage device
or type 'dmesg' again , see what it says at the end
yeah it will still ID as usb
there you go, bam! it sees it now
what's the 'sd' device it shows shortly after that
right around that mass-storage device message a sg or sd device should have been assigned
dmesg | less     then shift-g to go to the bottom and 'k' will scroll up
